description: 🎧 Skinwalkers 🐺 - A groundbreaking generative art piece that dynamically evolves 🌿 in form and structure based on listener interaction 🤝 and location 📍. This work blends art 🎨 and technology 💻, transforming digital elements like geolocation into expressive mediums 🌈. It adds narrative depth 📚, reflecting the listener's cultural and personal identity 👂, and stands out for its emotional connection 💖 and interactive experience 🎮. Each listening experience is unique, inviting audiences to a journey of new artistic frontiers 🚀.
name: Skinwalkers
